section1.title: 1. Data Controller
section1.content: Scripe ("we", "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This notice describes how we collect, use and protect your personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR - Regulation EU 2016/679).

section2.title: 2. Data we collect
autoData: IP address and technical browser data

section3.title: 3. Purpose of processing
purposes: Providing the B2B lead generation service

section4.title: 4. Legal basis
section4.content: We process your data based on: contract execution (service delivery), consent (for marketing communications), legitimate interest (service improvement and security), legal obligation (tax data retention).

section5.title: 5. Business data collected by the service
section5.content: Scripe exclusively collects publicly available business data (company name, business phone, business email, headquarters address, website) from public sources such as Google, Bing and business directories. We do not collect personal data of private individuals.

section6.title: 6. Data sharing
section6.intro: Your data is not sold to third parties. We share data only with:

section7.title: 7. Data retention
section7.content: We retain your account data for the duration of the contractual relationship and for the periods required by law (e.g. tax obligations). Search results are kept in your account until deletion.

section8.title: 8. Your rights
section8.intro: Under the GDPR, you have the right to:
rights: Erasure of data ("right to be forgotten")
section8.exercise: To exercise your rights, contact us at the email address indicated in the contact section.

section9.title: 9. Security
section9.content: We adopt appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data, including encryption in transit (HTTPS), password hashing and access control.

section10.title: 10. Contact
section10.content: For privacy questions or to exercise your rights, contact us at: privacy@scripe.fabioprivato.org

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of terms
section1.content: By using Scripe ("the Service"), you accept these Terms of Service. If you do not accept these terms, do not use the Service.

section2.title: 2. Description of the service
section2.content: Scripe is a B2B lead generation platform that collects publicly available business data from online sources. The Service provides verified business contacts through a credit-based system.

section3.title: 3. User account
items: You must provide accurate information during registration
You are responsible for your account security
An account is personal and non-transferable
You must be at least 18 years old to use the Service

section4.title: 4. Credit system
items: Credits are purchased through available packages
Each search consumes credits based on the quality level chosen
Credits are non-refundable, except as required by law
New users receive 10 free welcome credits

section5.title: 5. Permitted use
section5.intro: You agree to use the Service only for:
allowed: Finding business contacts for legitimate B2B purposes
Commercial communications compliant with applicable regulations
prohibited: Use data for spam or unsolicited communications to private individuals
Attempt unauthorized access to the system
Use the Service for illegal activities

section6.title: 6. Refunds
section6.content: You may request a refund of unused credits within 14 days of purchase, in accordance with consumer protection law. Already used credits are non-refundable.

section7.title: 7. Limitation of liability
section7.content: Scripe provides data collected from public sources with the utmost diligence, but does not guarantee 100% completeness or accuracy of the data provided. The Service is provided "as is".

section8.title: 8. Intellectual property
section8.content: The Scripe platform, its code, design and content are protected by copyright. Business data provided may be used by the user for their own commercial activities.

section9.title: 9. Changes to terms
section9.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms. Changes will be communicated via email or through a notice on the platform. Continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

section10.title: 10. Applicable law
section10.content: These terms are governed by the laws of the European Union. For any dispute, the court of the consumer's place of residence shall have jurisdiction.

section11.title: 11. Contact
section11.content: For questions about these terms: info@scripe.fabioprivato.org

section1.title: 1. What are cookies
section1.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They are used to make the site work efficiently and to provide information to site owners.

section2.title: 2. Cookies we use
section2.technicalContent: These cookies are essential for the platform to function and cannot be disabled.
technicalItems: scripe_token - Authentication token to keep the session active (localStorage)
section2.cloudflareContent: We use Cloudflare for site security and performance. Cloudflare may set technical cookies necessary for its operation.

section3.title: 3. Third-party cookies
section3.content: We do not use tracking cookies, advertising cookies or third-party analytics cookies. We do not share browsing data with advertising networks.

section4.title: 4. How to manage cookies
section4.content: You can manage cookies through your browser settings. Please note that disabling technical cookies may prevent the platform from functioning properly, particularly authentication.

section5.title: 5. Contact
section5.content: For questions about our cookie policy: privacy@scripe.fabioprivato.org
